The following samuraihistory poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: Why did Oda Nobunaga employ the young 
Kinoshita Tokichiro( Hideyoshi 
Toyotomi)? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Because he felt pity for Kinoshita., 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Because he knew that Kinoshita would become a great man., 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Because Nobunaga needed as many able bodied men as possible., 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Nobunaga needed a new sandle bearer., 1 votes, 25.00%  
- Nobunaga saw that this boy was intellidgant and witty and needed someone with his capability for learning., 1 votes, 25.00%  
- Nobunaga saw passion in the boys eyes., 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Kinoshita told Nobunaga that he would give his life for his lord at any time., 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Nobunaga had shown interest in the boys character and ambition, 2 votes, 50.00%  

INDIVIDUAL VOTES
- Because he felt pity for Kinoshita. 
- Because he knew that Kinoshita would become a great man. 
- Because Nobunaga needed as many able bodied men as possible. 
- Nobunaga needed a new sandle bearer. 
     - MuramasaIII@... 
- Nobunaga saw that this boy was intellidgant and witty and needed someone with his capability for learning. 
     - squrpio_prince@... 
- Nobunaga saw passion in the boys eyes. 
- Kinoshita told Nobunaga that he would give his life for his lord at any time. 
- Nobunaga had shown interest in the boys character and ambition 
     - cewest@... 
     - darkjj@...
